about.heading: ABOUT
about.description:
As a passionate developer, I aspire to grow as a Software Developer or DevOps Engineer. With strong experience in Go (Golang), TypeScript, Python, and C#, I excel at building robust, scalable, and automated software solutions.

My journey spans diverse industries â€” logistics, navigation, cybersecurity, and technology â€” where I've honed my expertise in microservices, CI/CD pipelines, database management, and process automation.

Driven by curiosity and a relentless desire to learn, I'm particularly interested in automation and workflow optimization. I enjoy contributing to open-source projects, exploring new technologies, and pushing the boundaries of what software development and DevOps engineering can achieve.
about.buttonText: Let's connect and build something amazing together!
